Package util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Credits
    Window to show credits and the GNU general public license
    Deck
    This class consists in handling a set of questions with their answers in one object called a Deck.
    DeckEle
    This class is the link from which the kind of linkeList class Deck @see Deck aremade of.
    DeckFileFilter
    Deck file filter (*.dk).
    DeckWriter
    This class handles conversion from String to Deck object and from Deck to String It is used when storing Deck as .dk files.
    Question
    Question class.
